R

RankingListController - Class in com.ning.breakout.controller
The controller class of the ranking list, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the ranking list.
RankingListController(MediaPlayer, StartGame) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.controller.RankingListController
The class constructor specifies the background music of the ranking list and sets the StartGame instance of the ranking list controller.
RankingListModel - Class in com.ning.breakout.model
Model class of the ranking list, which provides functions to sort records and stores the history top 5 records after sorting.
RankingListModel() - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.model.RankingListModel
The class constructor initializes the empty array list which used to store records.
readIn() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.model.RankingListModel
Reads in the records from the history score file.
repair() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Brick
Repairs the brick.
repair() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.CrackedBrick
Repairs the cracked brick.
replayGame() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoard
Replays the game (from the first level).
replayGame() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardManager
Starts a new round of game from the first level.
resetBall() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardManager
Moves the ball and paddle to the start point, resets the speed of ball and sets the lost status of the ball to false.
resetBallCount() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.controller.DebugConsoleController
Resets the ball count when the reset ball count button clicked.
resetBallCount() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardManager
Resets the ball count of the game board.
resetBricks() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardManager
Repairs all bricks and updates the brick count.
resetGameBoard() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.StartGame
Resets the game board when user clicks the play button in the main menu.
resetSpeed() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Ball
Resets the moving speed of ball.
restartLevel() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.controller.PauseMenuController
Restarts the current level of the game when the restart button clicked.
restartLevel() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.GameBoardManager
Restarts the current level of the game.
reverseX() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Ball
Reverses the moving direction of ball on x-axis.
reverseY() - Method in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Ball
Reverses the moving direction of ball on y-axis.
RIGHT_IMPACT - Static variable in class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Brick
Indicates the impact direction when the ball impacts the right part of the brick.
RubberBall - Class in com.ning.breakout.view.graphics
RubberBall is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Ball, with radius of 5.
RubberBall(Point2D, Group) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.RubberBall
The class constructor sets the model of the rubber ball, binds the layout of the view of the rubber ball with the model and adds the view to the container by calling the constructor of super class.
RubberPaddle - Class in com.ning.breakout.view.graphics
RubberPaddle is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Paddle, with width 150 and height 10.
RubberPaddle(Point2D, Rectangle, Group) - Constructor for class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.RubberPaddle
The class constructor sets the model and the moving boundary of the rubber paddle, binds the layout of the view of the rubber paddle with the model and adds the view to the container by calling the constructor of super class.
